name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD Display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2 inch screen,12 MP dual camera,  128GB storage, and a  4000 mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Watches
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistance design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish sliver color.

name: Speakers
description: High quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Television
description: TV with a 32-inch AMOLED display, water-resistance design, Full hd, 4k video display, and a stylish sliver color.
